argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pwslmod.y | |- Y = ( R ^s I ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` R ) = ( Scalar ` R ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_pwsval | |- ( ( R e. LMod /\ I e. V ) -> Y = ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) = ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) |
| 5 | 2 | #P_lmodring | |- ( R e. LMod -> ( Scalar ` R ) e. Ring ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. LMod /\ I e. V ) -> ( Scalar ` R ) e. Ring ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( R e. LMod /\ I e. V ) -> I e. V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fconst6g | |- ( R e. LMod -> ( I X. { R } ) : I --> LMod ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. LMod /\ I e. V ) -> ( I X. { R } ) : I --> LMod ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fvconst2g | |- ( ( R e. LMod /\ x e. I ) -> ( ( I X. { R } ) ` x ) = R ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( R e. LMod /\ I e. V ) /\ x e. I ) -> ( ( I X. { R } ) ` x ) = R ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( ( R e. LMod /\ I e. V ) /\ x e. I ) -> ( Scalar ` ( ( I X. { R } ) ` x ) ) = ( Scalar ` R ) ) |
| 13 | 4, 6, 7, 9, 12 | #P_prdslmodd | |- ( ( R e. LMod /\ I e. V ) -> ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) e. LMod ) |
| 14 | 3, 13 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( R e. LMod /\ I e. V ) -> Y e. LMod ) |
